class.name: SentryLogger
class.description: A dedicated API for logging messages to Sentry's structured logging system. Access this API through [member SentrySDK.logger]. [SentryLogger] provides methods for different log levels (trace, debug, info, warn, error, fatal) and enables structured data capture with your log messages. [b]Note:[/b] The [member SentryExperimental.enable_logs] option in [member SentryOptions.experimental] must be enabled for logging functionality to work. [codeblock] SentrySDK.logger.info("Info message") [/codeblock] To learn more about logs in Sentry, check out the [url=https://docs.sentry.io/product/explore/logs/]Sentry Logs[/url] product guide.

method.name: log
method.description: Logs a message with the specified level. See [enum SentryLog.LogLevel]. [codeblock] SentrySDK.logger.log(SentryLog.LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG, "Debug message") [/codeblock]
